attributes.action: Bring in laws to stop politicians lying in their manifesto
attributes.additional_details: Politicians lying in manifestos misleads voters and weakens democracy. I want the Government and Parliament to act so promises are honest, transparent, and accountable, restoring public trust and integrity in politics.
attributes.background: Parliament should make manifesto honesty legally binding, create an independent regulator to fact-check promises, require transparent costings, and hold politicians accountable for false claims or broken pledges to restore trust and integrity in politics.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Make the government legally accountable for delivering its manifesto promises" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/749381
